version_description:
Prepaid customers can now:
o Monitor their credit usage, check their credit balance
o Perform a credit card recharge
• Other minor bug fixes

Known issue with Invoice due date : In some cases the invoice due date is appearing empty, this happens only when there is no due date set up for invoices because the invoices are still open. We’re working to fix this issue as soon as possible and we appreciate your patience.

In this version of the My Vodafone app, we’ve completely overhauled the design and enabled access to a number of new features, including:
• Manage your International Roaming settings
• Set up or change Direct Debit information
• Update your account details
• Purchase data add-ons
• Check your usage details

* The ability to show password when logging in.
* Support is now consolidated under help. Email feedback is still available under settings.
* Other minor bug fixes.

As always we appreciate your feedback.
3.3.1 bug fixes from previous version

3.3.2

bug fixes

For postpaid customers all of your key information has been aggregated on a single page (Manage my plan). See contract end dates, upgrade eligibility, expiry date on special offers, handset insurance information and all of your current plan voice, data and international calling inclusions.

MyMix Prepaid and MyMix Postpay plans
Data bonus offer for selected Prepaid recharge transactions – Offer called out and T&C’s identified at point of recharge selection
Bug fixes
Stability enhancements

New International Calls Add-ons for Postpay customers
Improved presentation of inclusions and usage for Prepaid customers
Improved presentation of detailed usage information for Prepaid customers
Bug fixes.

• Great new visual design
•. Much simpler navigation – as an example if you are running low on data you will now see what you options are for a temporary top-up on the same page as where you usage and remaining balance is shown.

More efficient navigation around the app for billing, account settings and data usage. We regularly release new features and functionality for the app. These features work best on the latest operating system for your device. For the latest version of My Vodafone, you’ll need to be on iOS8 or above.

More efficient navigation around the app for billing, account settings and data usage. We regularly release new features and functionality for the app. These features work best on the latest operating system for your device. For the latest version of My Vodafone, you’ll need to be on iOS8 or above.
Minor bug fixes and UI enhancements

Experience our refreshed My Vodafone app.

Our newly refreshed app is ready to download – regardless of whether you’ve been using the app for years or if you’re new to Vodafone.

We regularly optimize and improve our app. For the best experience, make sure you keep the app updated to the latest version.

Improvements in this version include:

Various bug fixes

We regularly optimize and improve our app. For the best experience, make sure you keep the app updated to the latest version.

Improvements in this version include:

Various bug fixes

Bug fixes
UI changes to support new postpay plans
UI changes to support new NBN BYO modem plans
Introducing ‘Entertainment’ menu to replace ‘Subscription’ menu
Updates on error messages with more user-friendly copy
This latest version includes bug fixes and improvements so that you can manage your account even more easily.

We're rolling out our refreshed app to all users - our new app only works on iOS 11 or later. If your device doesn't support iOS 11 (such as iPhone 5 and earlier), you can still access My Vodafone via the web.

If you've already updated the My Vodafone app, we've also made additional bug fixes and introduced new functionality.

This latest version includes:

- The ability to change the app icon to the Vodafone rainbow logo. Vodafone is the Major Partner and the Official & Exclusive Mobile Service Sponsor of the Sydney Gay and Lesbian Mardi Gras.
- Enhanced security mechanisms
- General bug fixes and improvements

Now that the Sydney Gay and Lesbian Mardi Gras Festival is over for 2020, our app icon has reverted to the Vodafone red logo. You can change the logo back to the Vodafone rainbow logo if you’d like. Head to Account settings, View all settings, then scroll down to App icon.

Our app only works on iOS 11 or later. If your device doesn't support iOS 11 (such as iPhone 5 and earlier), you can still access My Vodafone via the web.

This latest version includes:

- Updated App icon
- General bug fixes and improvements

We’ve made it easier to identify plans that are eligible for a Bundle & Save discount. Look for the new Bundle & Save eligibility badge on ‘Your plan summary’ or ‘Change your plan’ menu.

Our app only works on iOS 11 or later. If your device doesn't support iOS 11 (such as iPhone 5 and earlier), you can still access My Vodafone via the web.

This latest version includes:

- Bundle & Save eligibility badge
- General improvements and bug fixes

- Improvements to the ‘Pay my bill’ process that provide a greater explanation of bill status and payment eligibility
- General UI, performance improvements and bug fixes
